text:
Anita Lindman (née Lamm; 14 May 1932 – 31 August 2018) was a Swedish television announcer and producer. She was known for the children's program "Anita och Televinken", which she both produced and announced for. She was a daughter of Uno Lamm and Ingalill Beckman.
Lindman died in Norrtälje on 31 August 2018, aged 86.
